data.eml:eml: A new species of Dialeurolobus (Hemiptera: Aleyrodidae) from Protea nitida in South Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Millar, I. M., Dooley, J. W. (2013): A new species of Dialeurolobus (Hemiptera: Aleyrodidae) from Protea nitida in South Africa. Zootaxa 3694 (2): 178-184, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3694.2.7
